thread.title: We hit the streets to find out how people earned their Big Mac (Paid Content by McDonald's)
thread.title_full: We hit the streets to find out how people earned their Big Mac (Paid Content by McDonald's)

title: We hit the streets to find out how people earned their Big Mac (Paid Content by McDonald's)
text:
We hit the streets to find out how people earned their Big Mac 0 By McDonalds 2017-02-22 00:00:43 UTC 
Everyone loves a good reward. And as it turns out, everyone earns one at some point in their day. 
Rewarding yourself when you achieve a big goal is great, but what about all those little things you accomplish every day – shouldn’t they be recognized too? 
Raise your hand if you: 
brushed your teeth today? 
showed up on time for work? 
Guess what! There's a #BigMacForThat. 
We set out to discover what people had done to deserve one of the most fulfilling prizes in all of reward-dom – the McDonald's Big Mac. 
This sandwich has been a staple for as long as most of us can remember and, for a limited time, it's getting even better. 
The Big Mac is now available in three sizes so you can always find just the right amount of juicy greatness to match your mood. 
If you're looking for a little bit of tastiness to munch on, the Mac Jr. is a fit for you. If you're looking to go all out, the Grand Mac has you covered. Of course, the classic Big Mac will always be there to satisfy traditionalists. 
So now, no matter how big or small your daily accomplishments are, there's a Big Mac to go with them. 
Discover how people earned theirs in the video above.
